title: Tainted Rose
description: Scarlett MillerSassy scholarship student.I’ve manipulated and deceived her.She’s all but broken, tainted.I made her mine, then pushed her away.She hates me now.Yet, she’s the key to my everything.And the truth I’ve hidden may take her from me.Welcome to Rosehaven Academy.This is a mature new adult high school series and contains situations that some readers might find offensive.Book 3, Ruthless Rose releases March 2021.
author: Leila James
